items.sentence: Don\'t even think about driving while intoxicated, Tom.
Without Tom\'s help, this wouldn\'t have been possible.
This is the first time that I\'ve seen a ship this big.
Why don\'t we take a break and go get something to eat?
Tom refused to do anything his parents asked him to do.
Tom resisted the temptation to lean over and kiss Mary.
Tom returned from the kitchen carrying a pot of coffee.
Tom rushed out onto the road without looking both ways.
Tom doesn\'t really care whether Mary likes him or not.
Tom drove past Mary\'s house on his way home from work.
Tom doesn\'t know how to explain what needs to be done.
Tom doesn\'t know the difference between good and evil.
Tom doesn\'t know whether the concert went well or not.
Tom\'s mother told him not to talk with his mouth full.
Unfortunately, Tom won\'t be able to attend your party.
What does Tom like to do that Mary doesn\'t like to do?
What\'s the difference between a turtle and a tortoise?
I think this is the only way to get rid of cockroaches.
She asked him why he was crying, but he didn\'t answer.
Tom said he had some personal problems to take care of.
